# Code Blocks Test

## Fenced Code Block with Language

```
`fn main() {
    println!("Hello, world!");
}````

## Fenced Code Block without Language

```
`This is a plain code block
with multiple lines````

## Literal Block

```
`This is a literal block
    with preserved formatting
        and indentation````

## Inline Code

This paragraph has `inline code` in it.
